projectName: AI-Native Textbook: Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics

corePrinciples.name: AI-Native Content Architecture
corePrinciples.description: All content must be machine-readable, modular, chunkable with proper metadata and RAG-indexable sections.

corePrinciples.name: Spec-Kit Plus Driven Book Production
corePrinciples.description: Every chapter must originate from a Spec-Kit Plus plan + spec + tasks pipeline with autogenerated tests.

corePrinciples.name: Docusaurus.ai as the Rendering Layer
corePrinciples.description: All book content stored in docs/ and rendered via Docusaurus supporting personalization and translation buttons.

corePrinciples.name: Automated Quality Assurance
corePrinciples.description: Every commit triggers spec validation, testing, RAG-index rebuild, and accessibility testing (WCAG 2.1 AA).

corePrinciples.name: RAG-Ready Knowledge Architecture
corePrinciples.description: All content chunked for Qdrant ingestion with 300-500 token chunks and proper metadata.

corePrinciples.name: Personalization Engine
corePrinciples.description: Support personalization based on user background, skill level, learning goals, hardware/software experience.

corePrinciples.name: Urdu Translation Engine
corePrinciples.description: Every chapter supports Urdu translation via translation button and JSON layer.

corePrinciples.name: Better-Auth Signup Flow
corePrinciples.description: Collect user data at signup to feed personalization engine.

corePrinciples.name: Accessibility Requirements
corePrinciples.description: All content meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards.

enforcementRules.responsibility: AI agents must correct violations automatically
